text:
There were lots of big iron towers
in the direction of the mountains.
Ah, those must be transmission towers.
I wonder how far they stretch.

Hmm... They probably go over mountains and across
valleys... It's likely they stretch far into the distance.

I've tried following them before, but no matter how
much I walked, it just kept going and it got dark.
Huh... Did you manage to find your way back...?
Yes, I did. I was fine.

That's good.
Just don't push yourself too hard, okay?

Electricity, huh?
It can take you anywhere easily.

But even Asahi can go anywhere,
though I'm not sure how easy it is...
So, for now, let's focus on the training camp.
Hm? I'll give it my best shot, though.
